articles.author: Priscilla Alvarez, CNN
articles.title: Biden administration prepares to open overflow facility for migrant children
articles.description: The Biden administration is opening an overflow facility for unaccompanied migrant children apprehended at the US-Mexico border, the federal agency tasked with the children's care told CNN in a statement.

articles.author: Ali Zaslav, Lauren Fox and Manu Raju, CNN
articles.title: Republican senators distance themselves from Marjorie Taylor Greene
articles.description: Senate Republicans are losing patience with Georgia's new Republican congresswoman Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene.

articles.author: Opinion by Paul Begala
articles.title: Joe Manchin's realism is just what the country needs
articles.description: Paul Begala writes that West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin will be a key Democrat in shaping the first two years of the Biden administration. And if Manchin's record is any indication, he will do so by bringing much needed realism and moderation to the US Senate.

articles.description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer said President Joe Biden told Senate Democrats at lunch Tuesday that he wants a "big, bold package" on Covid-19 relief and that he told Senate Republicans that their $600 billion proposal is "way too small."

articles.title: Ward: Kremlin rolling the dice by sentencing Navalny again
articles.description: CNN's Clarissa Ward says the new jail sentence for Putin critic Alexey Navalny was expected because he was seen as a threat but the Kremlin is risking getting international sanctions and making Navalny a martyr.
